title: OPEC presents its World Oil Outlook 2021 at ADIPEC
description: Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates, 16 November 2021--The Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) today held a special session to present the 15th edition of its World Oil Outlook (WOO), as part of the Organizationâ€™s participation at ADIPEC 2021 in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates (UAE).
